review: Tech Support Very Weak. I was given the Fire TV as a gift. Hooked it up. Worked great. I was really starting to enjoy and the it just quit. Now I have my 3rd box and second remote and nothing. The techs obviously have a script and if it's not on the script they don't know what to do. If you get one and it works I think you will enjoy it greatly. But if it doesn't, you may be kinda lost. Amazon has been great about sending a new unit, although I think that is in part because they have so little knowledge about how to debug an issue. They also don't know what the code is from the indicator light on my box. If you get one and it works, fantastic, enjoy. As of now, I'm looking at a refund.
